Get specific information from one EcoCounter installation

Source: R/get_EcoCounter_info.R
get_EcoCounter_info.Rd

Get specific information from one EcoCounter installation

get_EcoCounter_info(EcoCounterId)

Arguments

EcoCounterId

character or integer or vector of character or integer: Id of the EcoCounter installation

Value

data.frame with parsed data from EcoCounter API

Function version

0.0.1

Examples


EcoCounterId <- 100037011
get_EcoCounter_info(EcoCounterId)
#>          id                 name      nameId description serial gsm userType
#> 1 101037011 nach Markgrafenheide Z_101037011                               2
#> 2 102037011  von Markgrafenheide Z_102037011                               2
#>   userTypeHard latitude longitude photo                     timezone
#> 1            0 54.19103  12.18095  NULL (UTC+01:00) Europe/Paris;DST
#> 2            0 54.19103  12.18095  NULL (UTC+01:00) Europe/Paris;DST
#>               domain       lastGSM isGSM organisme interval       install soft
#> 1 Hansestadt Rostock -2.208992e+12     0       888       15 -2.208992e+12     
#> 2 Hansestadt Rostock -2.208992e+12     0       888       15 -2.208992e+12     
#>   hard sens channel  idParent etat numPratique ownerId dateActivation
#> 1         1       1 100037011    0           1     888             NA
#> 2         2       2 100037011    0           2     888             NA
#>   formuleSite filtre idPdcImg firstGSM weather_station_id date
#> 1           0      0        0       NA                  0 <NA>
#> 2           0      0        0       NA                  0 <NA>
